title: classy serif font
content:
Has somebody an idea which font this is? K and T are special. Thank you for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_example.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110601212303/http:/typophile.com/files/font_example_0.jpg) | 403.67 KB |
author: blingbling

comments.content:
The serif is [Hoefler Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20110601212303/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100010) from Hoefler & Frere-Jones.

The sans is Avenir ( expected it to be Gotham - also from H&FJ - but it's Avenir ).
Funny, every time I see Hoefler Text I go from Sabon to Adobe Caslon to Hoefler Text... :)
